website_summaries.verdict: With multiple festive colors that can change hues, these bulbs will set your Christmas decorations apart.
pros: Owners appreciate the slow transition from color to color
The bulbs also stay cool, making these lights safer to leave on for long periods of time
cons: Though the colors are nice, the light emitted is not the brightest

customer_reviews.title: Ignore reviews older than 2016: Typical Amazon bait and switch.
customer_reviews.text: Any reviews older than 2016 should be deleted. I've bought two sets of these. The first set was back in 2013 and worked great. Bought another in early 2016 and while they had worked fine for the 5 minutes that I tested them before putting them back in the box, it turns out in the intervening months they're already dead. The two versions are noticeably different; in the first version the bulb covers were nice and flush, whereas the more recent version has bulb covers superglued on (with string hanging off) and gaps between the bulb and the cover. The boxes they came in also changed, and the wires changed to a darker shade of green.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these Christmas lights, they look fantastic on my tree. The lights fade very slowly (New color every 1-5 seconds) between colors and it is a really nice effect. I found that 8 strands covers a 7' tree fairly nicely. The only negative I can think of is that the lights do tend to appear in blue/white/purple more than any other color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Magical color-changing lights. I've never seen anything like them.
customer_reviews.text: I get a new string or two of these every year. I've never seen any other lights like them. I was so tired of the same-old, same-old colored Christmas lights when I found these. They warm up in a few seconds and then slowly, calmly do their thing, fading gradually through all different colors. Peaches, aquas, reds, greens, lavenders, and blues, pastels and bright jewel tones. These are the lights to get. (I once bought look-alike but they changed colors much too rapidly and it was jarring.) I left four strings plugged end-to-end, turned on 24/7, outside, for about three weeks straight this year, and they never stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Kia Heavey

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!  Hot glued junk, that falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of similar lights, which were awesome,except they couldn't connect together. I bought these thinking they would be the same quality. I was wrong. They are junk. Little white balls just hot glued to a string of led lights. The balls fall off so easy. I buy a lot from Amazon, this is the worst thing I have ever bought. Unfortunately I bought enough to do the whole house. These shouldn't even be for sale, complete junk. Also they have an up for a week and half quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Always looking for the good ball lights and these are them!
customer_reviews.text: I run a burning man camp and these are great for our low key spaces-- they color change in a pleasing way and are the right level of brightness. Unfortunately, half the time I order ball lights through amazon, I get crazy blinking ones that you have to reset with a remote control every time they lose power (e.g. shutting off the generator), which are really untenable. But these are the good ones! I stocked up.
customer_reviews.author: xine

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a Year
customer_reviews.text: The Good: They look really nice!! The Bad: Poor quality Chinese item that only lasted a year, now they wont turn on. Sometimes they will flicker on, then shut off again, so there is a loose wire somewhere. This is based on my experience with the item and may be totally different from your experience with this light set.
customer_reviews.author: The Amazonian Man

customer_reviews.title: Never dreamed these color changing globes would be so beautiful! I had 2 sets and ordered 3 more
customer_reviews.text: I had bought by mistake this past summer. Wanted solar. Never dreamed these color changing globes would be so beautiful! I had 2 sets and ordered 3 more. I've had every light there is on my trees. I was shocked initially , dramatic "new" look. I've had round lights before too. But these are while balls (not breakable) and we have them slowly turning colors..gives a plum hue, turquoise hue changing. Red, yellow, blue makes up every color of rainbow. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Katbird

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lights!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to decorate my cubicle at work and they are great! The lights are bright and individually change colors at a slow and relaxed rate. Not to bright, not to dim, just right for office lighting conditions. Very happy and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but lousy quality control.
customer_reviews.text: As others have described, they are beautiful. So much so that I bought 2 more sets even though the first was damaged. They all work, but 2 of 3 sets had defects. One was missing the plastic globe on an LED. Another was entirely missing an LED with wires soldered together. Not even a bit of electrical tape to cover the bare wires. That's not acceptable. Maybe factory defects, maybe seconds or returns, but either way LEDwholesalers packages them and is responsible. So you might buy them for the nice colors and subtle changes, but be prepared to repair or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME LIGHTS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 sets of these for a 4' Christmas tree last year.....everyone who visited was mesmerized by these lights. Each little bulb morphs slowly from one color to the next. Unless you focus on one bulb you won't even notice the transition. This year I decided to brighten up the tree a bit by adding 200 tiny white LED lights. The tree looks FANTASTIC. Thank you Amazon for such quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Budgie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great. They provide a nice glow, change through various colors slowly and give a very nice appearance to our tree. These are look so nice and have worked so well I bought 2 more strings this year after buying 6 strings last year to begin to replace the other indoor lights we use around the house to decorate for the holidays. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little color changing LED globes
customer_reviews.text: I got these after our tree was up for the season, but tried them out for fun. The little globes did, indeed, all start out the same color, but then got out of synchrony and were slowly changing colors at their own pace. The frosted globes make the lights diffuse and pleasant. The changing of the colors was about as gradual as some color changing LED containing candles I have : not so fast as to be annoying and not so slow as to be boring. I'll post about the longevity of these lights after we have them in use for a season. So far, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Country Doc

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, slow fading LED lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are really cool. The bulbs are very little, perhaps only an inch in diameter, but the light they put out is really dramatic. They start off all the same color, but quickly go into a lot of different shades. Each bulb can be an independent color, and they fade really nicely between color and color. My only complaint, and it isn't a real one, is that I wish they changed a little faster. They are so slow you can barely notice the change, but that is cool in its own right. Oh, and we ordered 4 sets, and every single bulb worked perfectly, and chained together right out of the box. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Nice colours. Individual lights do not change at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice colours. Individual lights do not change at the same time so there is a constant array of different colours. However, I ordered four sets and the plastic covers were poorly glued on a bunch of them. They have come off on a bunch and I feel the rest will eventually fall off too due to exposure to weather. If more attention to this detail were made it would receive a much higher rating. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mori

customer_reviews.title: Bought 5 of these to use outside in MN. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these to use outside in MN. They worked all winter outside in the snow. We'll see if they make it a second year.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: For the last five years, we've put these lights out in the New England weather from around Halloween through New Year's, and they've held up well. All the bulbs are still working, the brightness of the lights has not changed. I like that these are soft in color, and the colors change very smoothly. Pretty good value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SKS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lights, Great Seller!
customer_reviews.text: Great lights! You can't control them in any way, they just slowly change. It's weird because they start off changing together and eventually it's a multi color set all changing randomly (no pattern). Still really nice lights. Had to send one of the two sets I bought back because one bulb was flickering and threw off the relaxing fading. They promptly sent me a new set with a prepaid return label, so still 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 99% Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These magically slow changing (each bulb independently) all-color bulbs are everything I ever wanted in independently slow changing magical christmas light globes. The only problem, and it's nit-picky, is that the over all hue is slightly blue/white. It's like too many bulbs happen to be white/blue at the same time all the time. I wish a warmer red or yellow tone was the dominant hue. Well, actually wish there wasn't any dominant hue. But I'm happy with these, and you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition and last
customer_reviews.text: Have used several holidays works fine. Need to attach 2 or 3 depending on size of tree but work great and add life to tree other than twinkle lights.
customer_reviews.author: Michael OH

customer_reviews.title: Very special
customer_reviews.text: These lights change smoothly, flowing from omen color to the next. They are not rote, mindless blinky lights,which change from one color to the next and then back to the first color again. These lights flow from one colors to another, to another, to another and in such a manner that every few seconds you have a new tree, whose color patterns are unique and therefore new each time. Really great lights.
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: They stop working after a few weeks. Pretty while they lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these only one is still working. The light bulbs seem fine so I assume something goes wrong with the mechanism inside the plugs. I would give these 5 stars if they lasted because while they are still working, they are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: BlueR

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these lights change color. It's very subtle and slow. They don't blink. 4 stars because I had to go over the strands with my hot glue gun and put a little glue on each white dome as some were not glued well enough. It should be noted that the domes are about 1" in diameter. I thought they looked smaller in the pictures under the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glowy colors
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Bought 5 strands to string between two buildings and I just love looking at the colors softly change. Definitely impressive to guests I have over!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lights - color change is very unique but not distracting.
customer_reviews.text: First review - lights are great. No issues for the first few days but I have not exposed them to the elements or extended use. Color change is very subtle, I like it so far, very relaxing. I'll upgrade to a 5 star if they withstand a season or 2 outside around my pool house.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: Mood lighting smood lighting
customer_reviews.text: Fun little lights that I use as night lights. Some of the globes did fall off but I was able to slide them back on because they are just glued over the leds.
customer_reviews.author: Bushwa

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gradual change Xmas lights
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they gradually change color which is what I was looking for, for Xmas tree lights. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Evans

customer_reviews.title: I love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, especially the gentle fade between colors and how the individual lights randomize over time. My wife and kids poked a little fun at me for how I fussed over them when they arrived. In all, I purchased three strands to use for our Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: DeekGeek

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY NEAT BUT GLOBES ARE SMALLER THAN I THOUGHT THEY WOULD BE
customer_reviews.text: The globes are a lot smaller than I thought they would be looking at the photo. They are about marble size. For some reason I thought they would be more like ping pong ball size. They are pretty bright though and I like the slow and random changing effect. Can't wait to put them up for Christmas. Thinking about buying more.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. P.

customer_reviews.title: ... put them in my classroom and they are so fun!
customer_reviews.text: I sure hope these last as I put them in my classroom and they are so fun!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: love these, they are still in my room hanging ...
customer_reviews.text: love these, they are still in my room hanging up since I bought them 2 years ago. Only one bulb is out! Worth the money. I get so many complements on them.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: actually purchased for infant stimulation
customer_reviews.text: We took our 3 month old to a restaurant that had the LED lights strung across the ceiling. It was the best dinner ever since she was so mesmerized by the lights. The owner told us his children did the same thing so they strung them from their baby rooms. I'm a little too nervous to do that "just in case" they were to fall and our little one could get strangled or tangled in them. But, we do get them out and string them up for her to see when we are with her at night. It's a fabulous babysitter when I'm doing laundry, folding clothes,etc...
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Strand is shorter than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. The strand was not very long. I had to order from a different company for longer strand. Lights are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: Great colored lights!
customer_reviews.text: These LED lights have been great. They are bright and the changing colors are fantastic. We've had them up in the weather over a year and on most nights and have' not had any issues yet. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I like that they don't flash
customer_reviews.text: Using the same string for the 2nd Christmas now, they are just delightful little balls of color that change so subtly you hardly notice. I like that they don't flash. They are not distracting at all. They are just a garden of colors and for me (and our little tree) bring the essence of the season into our home.
customer_reviews.author: Lyramia

customer_reviews.title: These look great on my small 2ft Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: These look great on my small 2ft Christmas tree, and the way they change color adds great ambience to the room. Would have been awesome if you could change color configurations or speeds.
customer_reviews.author: A. Studer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 6 strands went out in first 6 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I have had 6 strands outside around my pool enclosure for six months and have them hooked up to a switch. We only turn them on when we are outside at night, average of once or twice a week for a few hours. 2 of my strands just died. They go dim for a bit first, then completely die shortly after. I am going to purchase replacement strands because I don't want to replace all 6 but will likely look for another option if my other strands go. Overall, they look great and I'm happy with them except for the life expectancy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: its very nice light string
customer_reviews.text: Indeed, its very nice light string. The color changes slowly, and beautifully. It survived rainy Vancouver winter with no problem. Please note that it is fairly short one, it might be enough to decorate one small tree or a little stretch of your house, so do your math and calculate how many strings you need.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Work very well, but light has a cold quality
customer_reviews.text: LEDs have a cold light that I just can't get used to. These lights work as advertised, they're cool the way they gradually change to various colors, so in a way three stars isn't fair. But if you haven't liked LED colored lights in the past, don't be looking for a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Hamsun

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little globes, change color gradually and smoothly unlike some cheap stuff out there, Looks bright at night and pastel colors during the day - I don't even turn them off!
customer_reviews.author: CastleCC

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. A nice slow color change. At first colors are all the same but slowly each individual bulb changes.
customer_reviews.author: sue g

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition to Our Christmas
customer_reviews.text: These lights are large enough to get noticed, but not so big as to distract from the other tree decorations. The color change is slow and subtle, so it gives interest without appearing to flash. And they're reliable; after two years of use we've had no bulb or string failures.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these things. I have two sets of two, linked, in each of their rooms as night lights. The color timing change is slow, perfect for relaxation at night.
customer_reviews.author: Schumi Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - most of the lights failed after only a few months
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months a handful of lights started failing. After 6 months two thirds of the light string doesn't work. These are cheap lights & won't last - look elsewhere for your lights. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Folly Beach

customer_reviews.title: Really nice color changing LEDs
customer_reviews.text: The light casings make the LEDs glow softly. While they can't be controlled, they still look great and are a good price for what they can do. I ended up buying two more sets after I saw how nice the first were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome. slow-changing, soft light. but bright colors. wish they weren't so expensive so i could buy more...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Kraft

customer_reviews.title: ... lights for my dorm room and they are absolutely amazing. They are so cute and I love how ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these lights for my dorm room and they are absolutely amazing. They are so cute and I love how you never know what color is coming next. At first I was a bit hesitant because I didn't want a light that flashes different colors. These lights slowly changes colors. It is worth every cent. The cord is very long and the item is very well made and packaged. I am going to purchase around 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Millerq

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product, fast ship, good seller, will buy again. we have these hanging on the front of our bar and they're on 365 days a year! beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Light String
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot. Nice color changes with nice colors. The only reservation I have is the necessity of an extension cord in some cases.
customer_reviews.author: WRFmann

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: run these all the time and outside non-stop, have gotten complements from others in my apartment complex. if there was one thing i could change would be some kind of preset or sync feature.
customer_reviews.author: Nostradamus7

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning!
customer_reviews.text: The lights slowly fade from one color to another and it is mesmerizing! I hung these above my window and they add so much color!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Mesmerizing slow color changing lights
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous lights. Bought one last year then reordered two more because they are awesome. Mesmerizing to watch colors change slowly. Will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Susan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I bought 4 strings and 3 of 4 failed within ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 strings and 3 of 4 failed within a week :( Also 2 strings were missing globes. not recommended
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: unusual xmas lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights change colors and are round in shape. We used them to decorate a dock and they work fine outside. I hope to use them many years... we'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, pleasant hues, fun & dynamic - love them
customer_reviews.text: Love the colorful lights which gently alternate between several colors. This item adds great ambiance to my outdoor deck. Very happy with them - I get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K

customer_reviews.title: Order lots, you will regret not ordering a bunch of sets, they're gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous bright lights, they have such a smooth irridescent look to them. Wish we had bought more, they're unlike anything I have seen in stores
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cool lights! I haven't decided where I'll use them ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cool lights! I haven't decided where I'll use them yet, but always looking for something different, these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, But kinda S***ty
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying these lights are beautiful. My only quarrel is with how robust they are. I bought two strands of these lights for use on my outdoor patio. These strands are more delicate than they let on. One strand died in march (3.5 months after purchase) I assume due to moisture. Now I have a half lit porch.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slowly color-changing LEDS! We first ordered 2 sets, then and additional 2 sets. We wanted more but they sold out before Christmas. I have just now been able to order another 2 sets that we will use next year. I think it will be sufficient to have 6 sets on a 7 foot tree.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are fantastic. I like the colors and the timing of the color changing. The colors are pretty and not harsh. I've had them up over the summer, and now into winter and they work in all weather so far. I just bought another one because I want to add more!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant display
customer_reviews.text: Sample I received was true to its description: each bulb cycles through multiple colors.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: goes well on the Christmas tree and I cannot wait to use for other purposes!
customer_reviews.author: AprilRayne

customer_reviews.title: Total Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: After an hour all the bulbs go to one color and stay that way! Don't even consider buying these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really gorgeous and my favorite lights:))))) Love them)
customer_reviews.author: Nadya G.

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing lights
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful gradually changing colors--rather mesmerizing. Can't wait to display them on our first camping trip--will be the talk of the campground!! Going to purchase 2 more sets for my patio. Cindy Knight, Metz WV
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Knight

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 5 didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful when they work. 1 out of 5 purchased worked for 5 minutes then quit. They are exactly what I wanted, just frustrated that I had to go through the exchange process.
customer_reviews.author: sarah72978

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of lights. Will most likely order more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: ELJohnnyo

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases in recent time
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases in recent time. I love the slow changing colour and the length of the rope. I probably will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Abel Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are just what I expected and the best part they are LEDS. They seem durable and each light turns color and when they are off they look like round snowflakes.
customer_reviews.author: Parlee Family

customer_reviews.title: White light covers fall off, no replacements!
customer_reviews.text: Some of the white LED light covers fell off. I emailed the seller and asked for some replacement covers and never got a response.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H. Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really good, soft glow and they change color slowly in a way that isnt distracting, worth the price
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors
customer_reviews.text: The string of lights isn't as long as I thought it would be, but the colors are still so awesome and bright (:
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! The color transition is very gradual, and the colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: arusha

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lights
customer_reviews.text: Four star product except that each of the three strands I purchased had a missing a globe. So far the lights have handled outdoor exposure without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Colors change slowly
customer_reviews.text: The lights are a pretty pastel candy kind of color. The colors change slowly. You really have to watch them to see them change. We also had one string ruined by someone or something who clipped the wire. We can't tell if a bulb was removed or not. Weird. Overall we enjoy these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These light look beautiful. I would give 5 stars but one of the plug didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Guer

customer_reviews.title: Teach the little ones there colors
customer_reviews.text: Had these lights through 2 camping seasons now and get allot of complements on how good they look. Also got to teach my nephew colors with them changing. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: We bought two strings for two cabins we rented for a family reunion, and everyone, including the kids, loved them. The colors change soothingly, and I liked the size of the bulbs. Honestly, I don't know if I would put these on a tree, but for outdoor parties, RV's, or just plain fun, these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer alhambra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these they added a wonder effect to my tree
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA HERRERA

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had worked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a string of 50RGB LED color changing with 16 feet linkable string Christmas Lights by LEDwholesalers,2070. Wish they had worked but not a bit of light emited from the lights. Amazon handled the situation better than I could have expected. They were picked up by UPS the next day and my account was credited within 3 days. I'm impressed Amazon. Still wish they had worked.
customer_reviews.author: microguy

customer_reviews.title: Great Lights!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this string of lights for over a year now. I have left them outside when it rained, and also had them plugged in for a long amount of time. Always get complements at outdoor parties about them =).
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ok but we returned more of a easter light system
customer_reviews.author: DanW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but changes colors way too fast!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are well built, just the right brightness, but unfortunately change colors way too fast. They get annoying after about 10 minutes when used indoors. These would be PERFECT for a house party/rave. Luckily, I ordered these as well, and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged in the light string to see how they looked, the whole string stopped working after 5 mins. I tried to revive them with the supplied replacement fuses to no avail. Returned them to Amazon for full refund with no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: McCoolB

customer_reviews.title: These lights are awesome! They have such a different look from everything ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome! They have such a different look from everything else I have owned. I have a 7"' tree and used 5 strands plus I added 2 strands of Multi LED domed lights for extra depth. With a 10 month old puppy and 5 month old kitten, we decided to do a lights only tree so I wanted it to look cool.
customer_reviews.author: KATHRYN STOUPAS

customer_reviews.title: Failure to use after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Ooh gorgeous and the colors. Very cool. Slowly change into various colors Failure to use after 5 minutes. Not working. Failure occurs soon. No extra fuse.
customer_reviews.author: brick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lights
customer_reviews.text: I read the posts on this product and wasn't sure what to expect. Some people wrote that these get hot; that they only changed to a few colors; that they blinked more than fade into different colors; and that they did not connect properly. I have not had any of those issue. I have 3 strings of lights on our little Christmas tree, and they look wonderful. Even my husband commented on how much he liked these lights. I did have three of the plastic bulbs popped off but I just screwed them back on. The picture I included doesn't give the lights justice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights! Bought 3 sets and plan to use them on our Christmas tree this year. :) Update 12/14/15: Finally got our Christmas tree and put these lights on and I'm not sure we could love them any more than we do. I've added a couple of pictures both with our lights on and off. I don't know how these would look on a green tree but I am really digging the effect with the flocked one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: When taking the product out of the package I had a total of 4 bulbs out of 3 sets that the plastic bulb part had fallen off. That doesn't really bother me. It came with extra light bulbs and the covers themselves could just be easily hotglued back on. I'd say that all the lights do not change color at once. Such as, not all the bulbs are blue at the same time, but they do change color at the same rate. I really like these bulbs and they remind me of bubbles, so cute. I have a 5 foot tree and I think 3 strings were just right.
customer_reviews.author: breanne behnke

customer_reviews.title: They are really beautiful, and the color changes quite slowly and gracefully ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these lights to decorate our house for Christmas. They are really beautiful, and the color changes quite slowly and gracefully -- it is not jarring. The only downside is that the little plastic globes around the lights are cheap and tend to fall off, but they aren't essential.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised (Updated).
customer_reviews.text: Updated review - We loved these so much we bought three more. One did not work. A quick look at the string showed one LED with the wire loose. Some quick work with wire strippers and electric tape and they work again, minus one light. We still love them. But it would appear that quality control might be an issue - at least on one of the boxes we got. Have to take one star off for this. But we still love them. Original - Was worried about the reviews of too-fast color changing, but this was as advertised - slow and steady, and slightly out of sync so they randomized in a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said, you can't control the lights. But they are really beautiful. Whoever programmed their fixed program did an elegant job. Slow, subtle, and the colors are not just primary RGB - they are apparently random but somehow harmonious. I am adding a year later that these lights are unfortunately not very durable. After a few months (outside), the lights faded in intensity until they just died. Very sad, as they are otherwise fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: ERIC LIFTIN

customer_reviews.title: First order 2014, reordered this year!  Still good 4 years later!
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful. I want them for outside for next year Update! Original order 2014. I thought last year that I had ordered these again for the tree this year as I only had one strand. Well, not! I ordered another brand and when we got them out this year, they didn't work, were ugly, and nothing like these! So thanks to Amazon's 1 day shipping, I reordered 4 more strands of THIS brand and they are simply stunning. I can sit and watch the very slow changing of the bulbs and it is so beautiful! Don't order another brand! These are the real deal and the strand that I ordered in 2014 is STILL working just fine!
customer_reviews.author: JJHSS

customer_reviews.title: Neato lights for porch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 strings of these lights to outline my deck. Now nearly 4 months into them I can say they are fantastic and work flawlessly. I have them mounted out of the weather under the porch overhang, so I haven't ran into any of the difficulties with moisture or fading mentioned by some here. They do take some getting used to if you had some other version of string lights on your porch (or wherever.) They start off flashing through their colors rather slowly and seemingly synchronized at first but within a few minutes they are flashing fairly quickly and in an unsynchronized manner.
customer_reviews.author: G. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great round color change lights
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this past Christmas so can’t say on durability. Look great on the tree. Added to prelit warm white lights so can use with or without them. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: g'ma sharon

customer_reviews.title: Waves of joy
customer_reviews.text: These soft-glow, color changing balls will call you in like a Siren and not let you go until you're fully entranced and under their spell. Beautiful and majestic, radiating love. They'll make you want to pull on a Snuggie and curl up in a cuddle-puddle. Beware, these are for experts-only who are accustomed to lying back and staring for hours. Side effects may include dehydration and atrophy. Serious tripper-trap.
customer_reviews.author: O'mar

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED! VERY HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. No problems at all. Gorgeous colors and a slow transition into all of the different colors. I read reviews that were 5 star and one star. Either they had a bad batch or the people didn't understand how the lights were to perform and what size. I decided to go ahead and order them and I am very happy. I am going to order another set. There is a photo of the lights next to their plug and that will give you an idea of the size.
customer_reviews.author: susie barstow

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these. One string worked the other didn't. I returned one and ordered a replacement. Replacement arrived and did not work either. Apparently no quality control. Would never buy again. The one string that does work is very pretty and I love the changing color lights but how does my tree look with just one working string? Yeah crap.
customer_reviews.author: Uschi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice lights.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Christmas tree. They look great and change color nicely, only 1 bulb seems a little glitchy. Would have been 5 stars but the glue job on the opaque globes is sloppy ( lots of leftover hot glue strands ) and I had to reglue a few back on to the LEDs. Otherwise they're as advertised and can be linked together.
customer_reviews.author: lauren r.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool and gentle.  Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are really gentle and unique as they quietly fade in and fade out. Everyone one of the bulbs worked and the color change was unpredictable and fun. really nice purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mark H ✨

customer_reviews.title: Great comments from neighbors
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these for the second year in a row to expand where I place them for our Christmas decorations outside. The neighbors all have commented on how nice and "softly" these change color. I'm already thinking about where I'll expand using them next year. I've had a couple of sets now for the 3rd season so they've lasted in a "normal" year, the "polar vortex" year, and a very damp and rainy year so far.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beran

product_meta.title: LED Color-Changing Linkable 16 Feet Christmas Light String with 50 RGB Globes, X070RGB
product_meta.description:
Light up the holidays with this attractive and efficient LED light string with globes that randomly change color. They are linkable to cover long distances. After power is supplied, the bulbs gradually become random, displaying various colors. Specifications 
* Bulb Type: RGB LED globe 
* Bulb Quantity: 50 
* Bulb Diameter: 2cm 
* Distance between Bulbs: 3.93" 
* Length: 16ft 
* Wire Color: Green 
* Application: Indoor and outdoor use 
* Input Voltage: 120V, 60Hz
feature_bullets: Each LED bulb randomly changes color slowly
Very attractive, attention grabbing LED holiday lights
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars223 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
